files.patch:
@@ -54,9 +54,9 @@
-        "The dialog parent type.
" +
-        "The dialog modality type.
" +
-        "The print dialog type (Print dialog or Page Setup dialog).

" +
-        "2. Next, click on 'Start test'. Three windows will appear.
" +
-        "A Frame or a Dialog (On selecting 'Dialog' as parent type).
" +
-        "A Window (An undecorated top-level window).
" +
-        "A Dialog with two buttons: 'Open' and 'Finish'.
" +
-        "Windows (1) and (2) have a button.

" +
-        "3.Press the button on Window (1) & Window (2) -
" +
+        "	The dialog parent type.(e.g.Frame, Dialog, Hidden, Null)
" +
+        "	The dialog modality type(e.g Modal, Non-Modal, Toolkit modal).
" +
+        "	The print dialog type (Print dialog or Page Setup dialog).

" +
+        "2. Next, click on 'Start test' - Three windows will appear:
" +
+        "	Window (1) -a Frame or Dialog (depending on selected parent type).
" +
+        "	Window (2) -an undecorated top-level Window.
" +
+        "	Window (3) -a Dialog containing two buttons: 'Open' and 'Finish'.
" +
+        "	Windows (1) & (2) have a Dummy button.

" +
+        "3.Press the button on Window (1) & Window (2) 
" +
@@ -64,4 +64,6 @@
-        "Button is presseed - only if Modality Selection was 'Non-modal' or 'Modeless'.
" +
-        "In all other cases, Window (3) should block input to Windows (1) and (2).

" +
-        "4. Next, press the 'Open' button in Window (3). This will show the print dialog.

" +
-        "5. Press the button on Window (1) & Window (2) -
" +
+        "	If Modality is 'Non-modal'or 'Modeless', Button is presseed 
" +
+        "	If Modality is 'Document'& parent is not Frame/Dialog, Button is presseed 
" +
+        "	In all other cases, button is not pressed & Window (3) should 
" +
+        "	block input to Windows (1) & (2).

" +
+        "4. Next, press the 'Open' button in Window (3to open print dialog.

" +
+        "5. Press the button on Window (1) & Window (2)
" +
@@ -69,2 +71,3 @@
-        "The print dialog should block all three windows (1, 2, and 3).

" +
-        "6. Cancel the print dialog, Check again if Window (3) blocks Windows (1) and (2) correctly.
" +
+        "	The print dialog should block all three windows (1, 2, and 3).

" +
+        "6. Cancel the print dialog, Check again if Window (3) " +
+        "blocks Windows (1) and (2) correctly.
" +
@@ -72,1 +75,2 @@
-        "Button is presseed - only if Modality Selection was 'Non-modal' or 'Modeless'.
" +
+        "	Conditons as seen in Verification step 3 " +
+        "should be seen, as before.
" +
